text: (He it is Who sendeth down clear revelations) he sends down Gabriel with clear revelations, expositing commands and prohibitions, the lawful and unlawful (unto His slave) Muhammad (pbuh) (that He may bring you forth) through the Qur'an and the call of Muhammad (pbuh) (from darkness unto light) from disbelief into faith; and it is also said that this means: He has indeed brought you forth from disbelief into faith; (and lo! for you) O believers, (Allah is Full of Pity, Merciful) for bringing you forth from disbelief into faith.
